articles.author: Emma Roth
articles.title: Now Apple says it won't disable iPhone web apps in the EU - The Verge
articles.description: Apple says that iOS 17.4 will continue to support iPhone web apps in the European Union that are “built directly on WebKit.”
articles.content:
Now Apple says it wont disable iPhone web apps in the EU
Now Apple says it wont disable iPhone web apps in the EU
 / Apple says users can expect existing web app support to carry over to iOS 17.4, … [+1980 chars]

articles.author: Stuart Lau
articles.title: Putin's bluffing on nukes (for now), says top NATO official - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: “We do not see any imminent threat of Russia using these weapons,” said military alliance’s deputy secretary-general.
